alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 9:03PM EDT until May 01 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Richland, Calhoun and Lexington Counties. Enoree River At Whitmire affecting Newberry and Union Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Columbia affecting Richland and Lexington Counties. Saluda River At Chappells affecting Greenwood, Newberry and Saluda Counties. Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Richland and Calhoun Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saluda River At Chappells. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowlands around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. Cattle grazing river bottomland should be moved to higher ground. At 16.0 feet, Extensive farmland and river bottomland around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday morning and continue falling to 7.4 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Flooded roadways are nearly impossible to see at night. Avoid traveling in this area. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning by 900 AM EDT.
